text: Mahsun Kırmızıgül (born Abdullah Bazencir; March 26, 1969 in Bingöl, Turkey) is a Turkish actor, movie director, screenwriter and musician.Mahsun Kırmızıgül's profile on IMDB == Early life and career == Kırmızıgül was born on 26 March 1969 in Bingöl. He studied at primary and secondary schools in Diyarbakır. He started his career as a musician by singing for the weddings. In 1984, he was invited to Istanbul to make an album for Güneş Plak. The artist won acclaim with his movie Beyaz Melek which he wrote, directed and played. == Filmography == === TV series === * Alem Buysa... (1993) * Bu Sevda Bitmez (1996) * Hemşerim (1996) * Yıkılmadım (1999) * Zalım (2003) * Aşka Sürgün (2005) * Hayat Devam Ediyor (2011-2013) General Director - Story * Benim İçin Üzülme (2012) General Director - Story * Babalar ve Evlatlar (2012) - Story'' === Cinema === * Vezir Parmağı (2017) as actor, director, screenwriter. * The Miracle (2015) as actor, director, screenwriter. * New York'ta Beş Minare (2010) as actor, director, screenwriter. * Gecenin Kanatları (2009) as screenwriter. * Güneşi Gördüm (2009) as actor, director, screenwriter. * Beyaz Melek (2007) as actor, director, screnwriter. * Yaşamak Haram Oldu (1987) == References == Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish movie actors Category:Turkish singers Category:Turkish screenwriters Category:People from Diyarbakır Province
title: Mahsun Kırmızıgül
